name: irreducibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to make smaller or simpler: The human cell is irreducibly complex. Good music is irreducibly abstract. See
irreducible
More examplesFewer examplesThe future is irreducibly uncertain.In spite of all the fame, she remains irreducibly herself.Their art is grounded in ethnic identity and collective pride, yet is irreducibly individual too.
